content:
Observational Studies of Computing Work Practices

  • Consumption of Innovations in Computing

  • Key findings in the Web of Computing:

    • Computing is an embedded socio-technical package
    • Need multiple perspectives for analysis
    • History of commitments constrains choice
    • Narrow incentives motivate choice
    • Innovations cycle through fitting and packaging
    • Infrastructure, meso-structure and macro-structure co-evolve socio-technical arrangements
